sentences.english: Anhui Ying is the territory of the_…
sentences.chinese: 安徽颍上是黑恶势力的版图？

sentences.english: Be in Guangzhou, black tiger side and the North sea help two great vicious power run amuck at yellow Bu harbor.
sentences.chinese: 在广州，黑虎帮和北海帮两大恶势力横行于黄埔港。

sentences.english: There's no improbity force from witch and rabbi either.
sentences.chinese: 也没有巫婆和法师的邪恶势力。

sentences.english: He's a demonic spirit. He's a satanic force.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个恶魔，也是一股邪恶势力。

sentences.english: If you choose to be saved, no devil can stop you from being saved.
sentences.chinese: 如果你选择要得救，没有任何邪恶势力能拦阻你得救。

sentences.english: so I am campaigning for the downfall of evil throughout the universe. Yeah.
sentences.chinese: 所以我在争取全宇宙邪恶势力的倒台，是的。

sentences.english: We shouldn't cower when confronted by evil forces, we should rise and fight them.
sentences.chinese: 对于邪恶势力我们不应重足而立，而是要奋起抗争。

sentences.english: Sometimes In our life, there are seasons when it seem he is being steamrolled by evil.
sentences.chinese: 有时在我们的生命中，我们会感到恶势力势不可挡。

sentences.english: The underworld crimes are the outstanding expressive type of crimes in the new situations.
sentences.chinese: 黑恶势力犯罪是新时期刑事犯罪最突出的表现形式。

sentences.english: With knowledge and wisdom, evil could be vanquished on this earth.
sentences.chinese: 拥有了知识和智慧就能够把恶势力从这个世界上铲除。

sentences.english: We can not be soft with evil forces.
sentences.chinese: 对于恶势力，我们不能服软。

sentences.english: In the Bible, dragons represent the devil and they trick the world.
sentences.chinese: 在圣经里，龙是邪恶势力的代表，经常给世界捣乱。

sentences.english: At this time, there is a black bad influence just coming together here.
sentences.chinese: 此时，有一股黑恶势力正在此聚集。

sentences.english: Physical or mental harm, Goro Stephen ETA has never yield to evil forces.
sentences.chinese: 身心受创，戈罗斯蒂埃塔却绝不向恶势力屈服。

sentences.english: If good people stand by , evil will conquer all.
sentences.chinese: 如果好人袖手旁观，邪恶势力就会战胜一切。

sentences.english: Today's evil comprador forces are traitors.
sentences.chinese: 现在的买办恶势力就是汉奸。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
see 恃強欺弱|恃强欺弱[shi4 qiang2 qi1 ruo4]
to eradicate evil completely (idiom); thorough in rooting out wickedness
noxious winds, evil influences (idiom); malignant social trends
to wallow in the mire with sb (idiom); to follow the bad example of others
